text: And those who hope that the XXXX needed to blow off steam and will now be content will have a rude awakening if the nation returns to business as usual
We can never be satisfied as long as the XXXX is the victim of unspeakable horrors of police brutality

I have a dream that one day, down in Alabama, with its XXXX, with its governor having his lips dripping with the words of "XXXX" and "XXXX" -- one day right there in Alabama little black boys and black girls will be able to join hands with little white boys and white girls as sisters and brothers.

I have a dream that one day, down in Alabama, with its XXXX, with its governor having his lips dripping with the words of "XXXX" and "XXXX" -- one day right there in Alabama little XXXX and XXXX will be able to join hands with little white boys and white girls as sisters and brothers.

I have a dream that one day, down in Alabama, with its XXXX, with its governor having his lips dripping with the words of "XXXX" and "XXXX" -- one day right there in Alabama little black boys and black girls will be able to join hands with little XXXX and XXXX as sisters and brothers.
